alert.note: Alert for Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 8:06PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF LICKING COUNTY THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 806 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Granville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Heath, Granville, Pataskala, Johnstown, Hebron, Utica, Hanover, Beechwood Trails, Granville South, Marne, Alexandria, St. Louisville, Gratiot, Toboso, Fredonia, US Route 62 at State Route 661, Purity, State Route 310 at State Route 161 and Fallsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
